title: Fido Gets Dressed
subtle: Personal Recount (fiction), 20 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Early readers will enjoy this simple text in which a charming dog is dressed in familiar clothing. Picture-to-text connections, as well as opportunities to discuss the ways in which types of clothing are alike and different, are supported by whimsical illustrations.
meta: boots, cape, mask, scarf, sunglasses, sweater
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast text information
Rhyme : Listen for words that rhyme
Consonants : Associate the letter h with the sound /h/
Nouns : Understand that some words name things
Categorize Words : Categorize words associated with clothing
